author: lightclient
content:
I put together a small tool (still a WIP) which will let us define some attack scenarios that an honest node may face when maintaining a mempool of AA transactions: https://github.com/lightclient/bazooka

We can feed the victim these attack sequences over the wire and use built in metrics (in geth, pegasys, et al) to gather empirical performance results
